problem: Given X is the midpoint of UW. X is the midpoint of TV and UW . Complete the proof that VW∥TU . (Elements:  UX ,  TU ,  △TUX ,  △VWX ,  ∠VXW ,  ∠VWX ,  VX ,  WX ,  ∠TUX ,  ∠TXU ,  TX ,  VW , )
statement: X is the midpoint of TV
X is the midpoint of UW
reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
